DOC.detailed_description: A computer-generated randomization plan use assignment subject one six treatment sequence ( 4 subject per sequence ) : oxymorphone/propoxyphene/placebo , oxymorphone/placebo/propoxyphene , placebo/oxymorphone/propoxyphene , placebo/propoxyphene/oxymorphone , propoxyphene/oxymorphone/placebo , propoxyphene/placebo/oxymorphone . One dose blind study drug ( opana , propoxypehen , placebo ) give study day 1 , 5 , 9 . The primary endpoint time first symptoms moderate intensity ( NRS ≥ 4/10 ) treadmill ambulation . Ambulation assessment perform screening visit . Ambulation assessment also perform 90 minute administration study drug day 1 , 5 9 , evaluate pain intensity associate walk well distance cover patient . Quantitative assessment ambulation conduct treadmill 0° ramp incline 1.2 mile per hour ( mph ) . Measurement self-reported symptom severity use NRS baseline , every 30 second maximum 15 minute record . The following information also record : time first symptom , total ambulation time . The examination stop 15 minute onset severe symptom . Severe symptom define level discomfort would make patient stop walk usual life situation . No one encourage prompted continue walk beyond point . Patients instructed walk upright posture . They permit lean forward hold onto handrail examination . Secondary outcome measure include area curve present pain intensity ambulation specify time point , final pain intensity walking , walk tolerance , time return baseline pain level ambulation , well result series pain related questionnaire include : Visual Analog Scale ( VAS ) , Patient Global Assessment ( PGA ) , NRS , Roland Morris Disability Questionnaire ( RMDQ ) , modify Brief Pain Inventory short form ( mBPI-sf ) , Oswestry Disability Index ( ODI ) , Swiss Spinal Stenosis ( SSS ) .
